answers.answer: I'm 27 weeks, put on about 10 kg by now. And it's normal to put on about 500 g each week for the last 3 months, so hello 6 more kgs.. The weight gain is very individual, hope all of it will be gone a couple of months after birth. :)
I am 29 weeks tomorrow and have gained 22 lbs... The midwife was not happy...I gained 7 lbs from last month! Whoa

Ive gained a total of 55 lbs through my pregnancy. Im 39 weeks and 1 day and that is high!!!!! My doctors havent showed any concerns but it is a lot. They were only expecting me to gain 25 pounds my whole pregnancy because i am so petite.

I am 27 weeks and gained admit 7 pounds this last month. I have three doctors, and only one was worried because I have diabetes and hypothyroidism as well. Weight gain varies from person to person from what I've seen. Just hoping my baby isn't super huge, and that I can lose it after birth
Hello am 34weeks and 5days and I only have  gained 13 pounds doctor told me I just dont nned the extra weight for my fist pregnancy I gained almost 30 pounds:O it was hard loosing all the weight
34 weeks 2 days befor weight 115 now 152 tottal of 37 lbs all n my stomach area misserable n still have 6 weeks to go :-(
I'm 30 weeks and I've gained 19 lbs
I'm 19 weeks and haven't gained at all. My doctor is OK with it cause I'm overweight. I had a baby 7 months back and didn't take care of myself after so didn't lose the weight.
I'm 33 weeks and have only gained 6. Said the baby was weighing 4. I was worried I'd gain a lot

question: Hi im 28wks+1just wondering has any1 else put on alot of weight im up 14kg :-( :-(
title: weight gain
